metadata.title: CVE-2018-8881 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.13.02rc2 has a heap-based buffer over-read inthe function tokenize in asm/preproc.c, related to an unterminated string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.10.09-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.09-1ubuntu0.1').
